      class  Halfsegment

      Methods in stlib.datatypes.spatial.util that return types with arguments of type HalfsegmentIF

      java.util.List<HalfsegmentIF> Face.getHalfsegments() 
      Methods in stlib.datatypes.spatial.util with parameters of type HalfsegmentIF 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Halfsegment.compareTo(HalfsegmentIF otherHS)
      Compare this 'Halfsegment' object to other ones

      Ensures the total order of 'Halfsegment' objects
      The rule is specified in the paper of the ROSE Algebra paper:
      dominating points > left dominating point flages > directions (rotations)
